title: Project BARAKO
description: The BARAKO Project aims to develop an optimized method of propagating kapeng Barako seedlings.
alt: Project BARAKO Deployed in an Area

title: Project SIGAW
description: A cost-efficient tsunami early warning system to serve as an early warning to high-risk coastal areas.

title: Project SAGIP
description: Project SAGIP also known as Smart Air Gauge and Information Platform. A project currently under development by the Electronic Systems Research Center (ESRC)

title: Collapsible Solar Power Station for Farms
description: A Mobile Power Station for Farms aimed to solve energy problems experienced by farmers in Lobo.

title: Project SINAG
description: SINAG aims to leverage UV photolithography for pattern transfer during PCB prototyping in order to streamline the process and enhancing design flexibility.
